title: 【跑酷】OUTPOST PARKOUR|前哨基地跑酷|1.11.2|THE_BLACK_CAP
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-7 22:32 编辑 

简介 DescriptionA difficult parkour map, consisting of over 68,000 hand placed blocks! Based on the CoD MW3 map, OUTPOST and specially made for the King of Parkour, PrestonPlayz!Play time is apx. 25 min. and be sure to read the instructions at the beginning!This is my first official map creation, so let me know what you think!The_Black_Cap这是一个有难度的跑酷地图，包含大约68000个纯手放的方块！这个地图是基于CoD的MW3地图，前哨基地和专门为国王制作的跑酷，PrestonPlayz！游玩时间大概是25分钟。请一定要读一读一开始的介绍！这是我的第一个地图，所以请告诉我你在想什么，有什么评论！The_Black_Cap
图片 Pictures
